shabtay.coupon.system.DBDAO

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • shabtay.coupon.system.DBDAO.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    @Component
public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    CompanyDBDAO implements the methods from Interface CompanyDAO and uses CompanyRepository interface and CouponRepository interface to execute the methods in the class
    Author:
    Shabtay Shalem
